title: 01/20/21 DPS Best OF
itunes:title: 01/20/21 DPS Best OF
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP reflects on today's Inauguration. The Athletic's Bob Kravitz joins us to explain why he's recently walked back a bit of his initial opinion on the Patriots Deflategate scandal. Former NFL Lineman Ross Tucker also joins us to preview this weekend's playoff matchups. Did Patrick Mahomes actually have a concussion? What would Brady do to his legacy by beating Rodgers this weekend alone? Plus... the guys discuss the difference between a procedure and a surgery.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP reflects on today's Inauguration. The Athletic's Bob Kravitz joins us to explain why he's recently walked back a bit of his initial opinion on the Patriots Deflategate scandal. Former NFL Lineman Ross Tucker also joins us to preview this weekend's playoff matchups. Did Patrick Mahomes actually have a concussion? What would Brady do to his legacy by beating Rodgers this weekend alone? Plus... the guys discuss the difference between a procedure and a surgery.
